name: Netkandi
description:
We are Netkandi, offering web solutions and online marketing to a range of clients across different industries. Our diverse team of web developers and digital marketers specialize in web services, PPC, SEO, content writing and social media marketing.
We work with new, small and medium-sized businesses, tailoring our services to meet each individual client’s specific needs and preferences – ensuring that they always receive the best possible support required to allow their company to thrive.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 1st Floor, Suite 2, Belgrave House, Station Way
